name: Shranks Cool Onion Collecting Game
description:
Note: THIS IS A JOKE GAME AND I WONT TAKE IT LEGIT.

You got lost in the woods searching for the legendary Ogremin named Shrank. You got lost, and now your only hope is to collect the 8 lost onions. Will you survive? Or will you be thrown into Shrankk's Barrel of punished.

Use W A S and D to move Forward, Left, Right, and Back.
